FuncDef: This command configures the Ethernet header for the NAT sources.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the destination MAC address field of the of the Ethernet encapsulation used for the NAT subscribers associated with this mirror source up to 30 characters.
Specifies the source MAC address field of the of the Ethernet encapsulation used for the NAT subscribers associated with this mirror source up to 30 characters.
Specifies the ethertype of the ethernet encapsulation used for the NAT subscribers associated with this mirror source that have an intercept identifier. Values-1536 to 65535.
